Description: We are located in Central Illinois and have been in business for nearly 40 years. We carry products from some of the most respected manufacturers in the music industry including Fender, Vox, Dream Cymbals, Roland, Yamaha, Blackstar, Behringer, Takamine, ESP, Schecter, Shure, ADJ, Wampler, TC Electronic and more. Up for sale is an Ibanez SR505 5 string bass. Sound and playability are excellent and fretwear is minimal. It is a little rough in cosmetic condition; please see pics to get a good idea of what to expect. Electronics and hardware are all in excellent condition. The Ibanez SR505 Bass is an incredibly well-crafted and equipped bass for its price. It features a slim, fast SR5 5-piece jatoba and bubinga neck on a sculpted mahogany body. The rosewood fretboard is fitted with medium frets and has oval abalone markers. The Accu-Cast B305 bridge offers easier string changes, single-screw saddle and height adjustment, and improved stability.For pickups it sports 2 Bartonlini MK1s which integrate perfectly with its active EQB-IIIS 3-band eq, in addition, it has equipped with mid-frequency select switch (250Hz or 600Hz) which provides more tonal versatilities and controls. It's a bass that will excel in any style of music.
